title: Video: Youth Lagoon – July
body:
**Tyler T Williams** has done it again.

Having [visualized](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11026-video-youth-lagoon-%E2%80%93-montana/) **Youth Lagoon’s** _Montana_ in such a stirring and tear-inducing way, he’s taken another cut from **_The Year of Hibernation_** and put it to a stunning video. Almost seeming like a sequel to Montana, the beautifully shot clip is again a admirably personal insight into the music of **Trevor Powers** and his hometown of Boise. Capturing the very essence of the fragile elegance of _July_, it’s another in a long line of classics from **Williams**. Check out the clip below, and the dates **Youth Lagoon’s** upcoming tour.

[Youth Lagoon – July](http://vimeo.com/34332459) from [Tyler T Williams](http://vimeo.com/tylertwilliams) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
